company_overview.name: sentAIent
company_overview.value_proposition: Human augmentation, not replacement - AI handles data analysis and routine inquiries while humans focus on strategic decisions and complex relationships
company_overview.philosophy: Human-centric AI implementation with transparency, fairness, privacy, and accountability

autonomous_ai_agents.title: Autonomous AI Agents
autonomous_ai_agents.description: Deploy autonomous digital employees that automate business roles, streamline processes, and augment human teams for significant efficiency increases
benefits: Scale operations without proportional headcount increase
Measurable ROI with clear performance metrics

generative_ai_chatbots.title: Generative AI Chatbots
generative_ai_chatbots.description: Custom-trained AI chatbots that speak in your brand voice, providing 24/7 customer support, sales assistance, and marketing engagement
benefits: Build brand loyalty through consistent voice
Instant customer support and lead qualification

digital_marketing.title: Digital Marketing Services
digital_marketing.description: Comprehensive digital marketing solutions powered by AI insights and automation

ai_consulting.title: AI & Automation Consulting
ai_consulting.description: Remove research and guesswork from AI integration with expert strategy design and implementation guidance

business_consulting.title: Business Consulting

software_development.title: Custom Software Development
software_development.description: Build tailored software solutions that meet your unique business requirements

brian_leonard.name: Brian Leonard
brian_leonard.bio: Brian Leonard leads sentAIent's AI strategy, focusing on developing autonomous AI agents that augment human capabilities. With deep expertise in AI implementation and business transformation, Brian guides organizations through their AI journey with a human-centric approach.

greg_francis.name: Greg Francis
expertise: Transforming complex AI concepts into operational reality
greg_francis.bio: Greg Francis specializes in corporate solutions, transforming complex AI concepts into operational excellence. His expertise lies in bridging the gap between AI capabilities and practical business implementation, ensuring measurable results and sustainable value.

finance.title: Financial Services
solutions: AI-powered customer service for account queries

for_businesses.headline: Transform Your Business with AI That Works for You
for_businesses.subheadline: Deploy autonomous AI agents that augment your team, automate routine tasks, and deliver measurable ROI
key_benefits: Increase efficiency by 40-60% through intelligent automation
Scale operations without proportional cost increases
Make data-driven decisions with real-time insights
Focus your team on strategic, high-value work

for_consumers.headline: Experience the Future of AI-Powered Applications
